urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

urls.title: Visa & Health Information
urls.description: Visa information Many countries require visitors to have a visa or other personal identification documentation prior to entry. To determine the particular immigration needs of any country you are considering visiting, go to the visa section below, select the type of passport you hold and your nationality from the list provided. Finally, select your destination point along with any single or multiple transit points. This will provide you with a quick overview of requirements. However, for the latest information on specific country requirements, we strongly recommend that you contact the local Embassy or Consulate of the country you intend to visit. Health regulations Some countries may require valid certificates of inoculation and/or vaccination or other related requirements, you can check these requirements using the form below.

data.text:
@samstormhammer Dear sam stormhammer,
We strongly recommend that you double check foreign entry requirements by contacting your local Embassy or Consulate.
You may visit GF website for visa information by clicking the below provided link.
https://t.co/MO8XHRUNab
Thank You

Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

urls.title: Worldwide contact center
urls.description: Have you tried searching for your query on gulfair.com? Ticket bookings,Timetable, Flight Status and more are just a click away! For telephone assistance with your queries, our reservation sales agents are available to serve you 24 x 7. Our World Wide Contact Center offers convenient facilities. You can book your ticket and pay through your credit card (Visa, Master or American Express) or get a time limit to pay later. Or if you have an existing booking, our call center helps you upgrade your class, change your flight date, reroute your flight or request special services like wheelchair, meet and assist, seat assignment and special meal or even cancel the booking. You can also update your booking profile details like Falconflyer Programme number, telephone numbers, email address and travel documents info. We have assigned a special line for our Falconflyer Programme members. FFP members can redeem miles for new bookings or upgrade an existing booking from Economy to Falcon Gold. Membe

urls.title: Baggage
urls.description: Children, aged 2 years and older, travelling on Gulf Air operated services, get the same checked baggage allowance as adults plus a child's collapsible stroller/pushchair and a child's car seat. Infants, aged under 2 years, get a special allowance of one piece of 15 KGs for checked baggage, plus a collapsible stroller/pushchair and an infant car seat. Infants are also entitled to one cabin baggage (maximum dimensions 44 x 35 x 20 cm or 17 x 13 x 7 inches) with a total weight of 3 KGs.

urls.title: Flying with us during COVID19

data.text:
@FaisalShahim Hello!

Thanks for getting in touch with Gulf Air.
Please, check travel alerts through https://t.co/p4nsGkuDCu We still advise you to refer to the concerned authorities for more details regarding your query above.

Regards

urls.title: Expectant Mothers
urls.description: You and your unborn child's safety are our priority. To avoid unnecessary risks to you and your baby, we recommend that all expectant mothers consult a doctor before booking their ticket. Depending on the stage of your pregnancy and certain details, you may be required to carry certain medical forms. While a medical certificate is not required up to and including the 28th week (for a single pregnancy) or up to and including the 22nd week (for a multiple pregnancy), Gulf Air highly recommends that you carry a letter from your own doctor stating your estimated due date. Please note that if, in our opinion, we feel that you may not be fit to travel or to complete your whole journey safely, we may not accept you on board. Please see below for our guidelines on which medical forms may be required. DE
